title: MerchantFcShippingLocation
description: This schema is used to set up a specific merchant operated shipping location

merchant_fc.description:
Name used to identify the given shipping location

			#Valid Value

			1-30 character limit

fc_address_line_1.description: Line 1 of the drop ship location address

fc_address_line_2.description: Line 2 of the drop ship location address

fc_address_city.description: drop ship location address address city

fc_address_state.description: drop ship location address address state

fc_address_zip.description: drop ship location address address zip code

merchant_operating_days.description:
Days of the week that the given shipping location is open for operations.  

			Enter all that apply in pipe delimited format. Ex: Mon | Tues| Wed | Thu  	

			#Valid Values

			*'sun' - Sunday

			*'mon' - Monday

			*'tue' - Tuesday

			*'wed' - Wednesday

			*'thu' - Thursday

			*'fri' - Friday

			*'sat' - Saturday

fulfillment_time.description:
Number of business days from when you send order to the drop shipper until it will be shipped

			#Valid Values

			*'0' - ships the day the order is received

			*'1' - ships one business day after the order is received

			*'2' - ships two business days after the order is received
			
			*'n' - ships n business days after the order is received

local_pickup_instructions.description: Instructions that will be presented to the customer if they choose are using the Local Pick Up option at check out on Jet.com

local_delivery_zips.description:
Zip Codes where Local Delivery is supported.
            
            #Logic

            This is required if 'local delivery' was set up as a 'shipping_method'

local_pickup_day.description:
The day of the week that you are open for local pickup

                    #Valid Values

					*'sun' - Sunday

					*'mon' - Monday

					*'tue' - Tuesday

					*'wed' - Wednesday

					*'thu' - Thursday

					*'fri' - Friday

					*'sat' - Saturday

local_pickup_open_time.description: Time that given merchant_fc is open for local pickup on the given local_pickup_day

local_pickup_close_time.description: Time that the given merchant_fc closes for local pickup on the given local_pickup_day

service_level.description:
If ShippingMethod or ShippingCarrier are provided this provides ability to associate those to the given ServiceLevel.  
                    (This will allow you then to define shipping rates by ServiceLevel rather than for each ShippingMethod or ShippingCarrier)
					
					If only ServiceLevel is provided then it will be treated as the desigination used by Jet to indicate how to send your shipments

					#Logic

					This is required if 'shipping_carrier' and 'shipping_method' are not provided

					#Valid Values

					*'Standard'

					*'Expedited'

					*'Scheduled'

					*'NextDay'

					*'SecondDay'

shipping_carrier.description:
A shipping carrier, including all that carrier's ShippngMethods e.g. UPS, FedEx, USPS.  Use this field if you want to define your shipping settings at the ShippingCarrier level.

                    #Logic

                    If 'shipping_carrier' is populated then 'shipping_method' will be ignored

                    #Valid Values
                    
					*'UPS'

					*'USPS'
			
					*'FedEx'

shipping_method.description:
A specific shipping method e.g. UPS Ground, UPS Next Day Air, FedEx Home. If shipping set up has defined ShippingMethod level and you are setting up shipping rates at the ShippingMethod level use this field.

					#Logic

					This message should be defined by service_level OR shipping_carrier OR shipping_method

					#Valid values

					*full list of valid ship methods not yet available

					*'local delivery' will be an option

shipping_option_day.description:
Day that given 'service_level', 'shipping_carrier' or shipping_method' picks up from your 'merchant_fc'

                    		#Valid Values

							*'sun' - Sunday

							*'mon' - Monday

							*'tue' - Tuesday

							*'wed' - Wednesday

							*'thu' - Thursday

							*'fri' - Friday

							*'sat' - Saturday

shipping_option_order_cutoff_time.description: Time of day (local) that a 'merchant_order' must be received by in order to count as being received that calendar day for purposes of calculating 'fulfillment_time' for the given 'service_level', 'shipping_carrier', or 'shipping_method

shipping_option_order_pickup_time.description: lastest time of day that a given'service_level', 'shipping_carrier' or shipping_method' is picked up from the 'merchant_fc'
